SIWES Institutional Advancement Office Library Personnel PolyVentures Limited Registry Sports Unit Student Affairs Vocational Skills & Entrepreneurial Study Centre TetFund Special Intervention Disaster Recovery High Impact National Research Fund Zonal Intervention Annual Intervention Academic Manuscript Development Academic Research Journal Academic Staff Training and Development Conference Attendance Entrepreneurship Equipment Fabrication ICT Support Physical Infrastructure Teaching Practice Tetfund Project Maintenance New & Events Contact let slideIndex = 0; showSlides(); function showSlides() { let i; let slides = document.getElementsByClassName("mySlides"); let dots = document.getElementsByClassName("dot"); for (i = 0; i < slides.length; i++) { slides[i].style.display = "none"; } slideIndex++; if (slideIndex > slides.length) {slideIndex = 1} for (i = 0; i < dots.length; i++) { dots[i].className = dots[i].className.replace(" active", ""); } slides[slideIndex-1].style.display = "block"; dots[slideIndex-1].className += " active"; setTimeout(showSlides, 3000); // Change image every 3 seconds } Welcome to The Polytechnic Ibadan You are welcome to The Polytechnic Ibadan, the citadel of learning and Centre for academic excellence. Established more that five decades ago, our function has been to provide for students training and development of techniques in Applied Science, Engineering, Environmental Studies, Business and Communication Studies. We have been producing mainly middle-level manpower that has been making valuable contributions to the Social and Economic development of the country. I once again welcome you to the "TPI" as it is fondly called. PROGRAMMES TPI runs these programmes Full Time We are thrilled to have you join our dynamic community of learners and innovators. Our programmes is designed to equip you with the skills and knowledge needed for a successful career in your chosen field. We run undergraduates programmes in National Diploma and in six faculties. With experienced faculty, cutting-edge facilities, and a supportive environment, you will find everything you need to excel. Explore, learn, and thrive with us at TPI, your journey to a bright future starts here! Read More Continuing Education Center (CEC) At CEC, we are dedicated to your lifelong learning journey. Our diverse range of courses and programmes are designed to help you enhance your skills, advance your career, and achieve your personal goals. With flexible schedules, expert instructors, and a supportive learning environment, you will find the perfect opportunity to grow and succeed. Join us at TPI CEC, where learning never stop!" Read More Open Distance and flexible Learning (ODfel) Our ODFeL programme offers you the flexibility to learn anytime, anywhere. With a wide range of courses designed to fit your schedule, you can achieve your educational goals without compromising your personal or professional commitments. Our dedicated faculty and comprehensive resources ensure you have the support you need to succeed. Embark on your learning journey with TPI ODFeL. Your future, your way! The award of h... Read More OUR EVENTS 06Jun 2024 FBCS ANNUAL NATIONAL CONFERENCE 10:00:00 Assembly Hall FACULTY OF BUSINESS AND COMMUNICATION STUDIES 2024 ANNUAL NATIONAL CONFERENCE: Theme:- Managing Change for Sustainable Development in Nigeria Read More The Polytechnic, Ibadan was established on 7th August 1970 as a successor to the erstwhile Technical College, Ibadan under the provisions of a Principal Edit 1970. This Edict has undergone several amendments in order to make The Polytechnic relevant to the present day needs of Oyo State, the proprietor in particular, Nigeria, and the World at large. CONTACT +234 906 227 4900 registrar@polyibadan.edu.ng www.polyibadan.edu.ng Polyibadan, Sango-Eleyele Express Road, Ibadan. Know More Apply Online Fill out the online application form to start your journey towards gaining valuable skills. By applying online, you take the first step towards becoming proficient in your chosen trade. Our comprehensive courses are designed to equip you with the knowledge and expertise needed to excel in your field. Certification Acquire the right certification to become a skilled and trained entrepreneur through our comprehensive skill acquisition trades and programs. Our courses are meticulously designed to provide you with the essential knowledge and hands-on experience needed to excel in your chosen field. The Polytechnic Ibadan VOCATIONAL SKILLS & ENTREPRENEURSHIP STUDY CENTRE The Centre was established in compliance with the Federal Government's initiative through NBT Ethat all tertiary institutions in Nigeria must establish Entrepreneurship Development Centres (EDC) to solve graduatesunemployment crises by ensuring that they acquire functional entrepreneurial skills, desirable work habit in addition to their formal education which will enable them to be self-reliant, self-employed and productive members of the society. To this end, Vocational Skills and Entrepreneurship Study Centre (VSESC) was resuscitated by... About VSESC There are many ways to learn Our Trade Courses Block Moulding and Concreting Household Products Catering and Confectioneries View All Trade Courses Our campus have a lot to offer for our studentsTAKE A CAMPUS TOUR About US The Centre was established in compliance with the Federal Government's initiative through NBT Ethat all tertiary institutions in Nigeria must establish Entrepreneurship Development Centres (EDC) to solve graduatesunemployment crises by ensuring that they acquire functional entrepreneurial skills, desirable work habit in addition to their formal education which will enable them to be self-reliant, self-employed and productive members of the society.
